name: Illhveli, Nauthveli
description: The Illhveli is a gargantuan monstrosity that embodies the terror of the deep sea, with an imposing physical presence.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear and swallow foes whole makes it a terrifying presence in aquatic encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate swimmers and coastal inhabitants, instilling fear and causing chaos.
relations: May be encountered alongside other aquatic monsters or serve as a guardian of undersea territories.
environment: Often found in deep ocean waters, near coastal regions, or shipwrecks.
strengths: High physical strength and resilience, exceptional swimming speed, and immunity to frightened condition.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and has a low Intelligence, relying on instinct.
attacks: Can deliver devastating bite and tail attacks, grapple foes, and swallow smaller creatures whole.
most_powerful_ability: The Thunderous Bellow unleashes a powerful sonic attack, causing thunder damage and knocking foes prone.
senses: Has darkvision and a high passive perception of 17, enhancing its awareness in underwater environments.
skills: Excels in Athletics and Perception, demonstrating proficiency in swimming and hunting.
additional_information: Hold Breath for up to one hour.
Double damage to structures due to Siege Monster ability.
Surrounded by a supernatural aura of dread.
Can grapple and restrain foes with its powerful bites.
Swallowed creatures suffer ongoing acid damage while inside.
test_queries: deep sea predator with incredible strength
